title: Tiger's Voyage
description: With the head-to-head battle against the villainous Lokesh behind her, Kelsey confronts a new heartbreak: in the wake of his traumatic experience, her beloved Ren no longer remembers who she is. As the trio continue their quest by challenging five cunning and duplicitous dragons, Ren and Kishan once more vie for her affections.
author: Colleen Houck
